amendment.description: To save at least $7,000,000,000 by consolidating some duplicative and overlapping Government programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 610 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 602.
Amendment SA 610 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 133.
